meanings.sent1: The school has strict regs about uniforms.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to follow all the parking regs in this area.
meanings.sent3: The silly chicken tried to argue with the traffic light regs.
meanings.sent4: The strict regs of the library were like a fortress protecting the books.
meanings.sent5: Learning the safety regs is crucial for everyone's well-being.

meanings.sent1: The coffee shop regulars always sit at the same table.
meanings.sent2: She became one of the gym regulars after a few weeks.
meanings.sent3: The regulars at the park bench shared stories and laughter.
meanings.sent4: Being one of the regulars at the diner felt like being part of a family.
meanings.sent5: The regulars at the bookstore knew each other by name.

meanings.sent1: The military regiments trained hard for the upcoming mission.
meanings.sent2: Each of the regiments had a specific role in the battle.
meanings.sent3: The regiments of ants worked together to build their nest.
meanings.sent4: The regiments of clouds marched across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The regiments of flowers in the garden created a beautiful display.
